welcome_message_body: Welcome to Joinville, Brazil! Known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all the charm this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lauro Carneiro De Loyola Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.
